subject: TestSuite
msgSnippet: Hi, I have a small problem using TestSuites. We organise our tests such that there is a test suite for each package, and one for the entire project. The
messageBody:
Hi,

I have a small problem using TestSuites. We organise our tests such
that there is a test suite for each package, and one for the entire
project. The project level suite aggregates the package suites. The
problem is that when running the project level suite it says that
there's no tests defined for the package level suites. When I run the
package suites however things are ok! What could be wrong - I'm
relatively new to JUnit.

I'm using the ant junit task

The code for the project level suite

public class TestProject
extends TestSuite {

public TestProject(String s) {
super(s);
}

public static Test suite() {
TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
suite.addTestSuite(dk.company.emc.TestPackage.class);
return suite;
}
}

The code for the package level suite

public class TestPackage
extends TestSuite {

public TestPackage(String s) {
super(s);
}

public static Test suite() {
TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
suite.addTestSuite(dk.company.emc.TestBlackBoard.class);
return suite;
}
}

Thanks in advance
Bo
